title: Family beef topside roast dinner for under a tenner
ingredients: ['Roast', '1kg beef topside', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon oil', 'Side dishes', '4 Aunt Bessie’s® Irresistible Yorkshire puddings', '10 Aunt Bessie’s® Homestyle Roast Potatoes', '10 Aunt Bessie’s® Delicious Honey Glazed Roast Parsnips', '1 knob of butter', '1 leek, sliced', '125g baby mushrooms, halved', '250ml hot beef stock', '75ml double cream']
